description.name: usdcerc20
description.tagline: USD Coin erc20 Crypto Payment Gateway (No KYC)
description.long: Crypto erc20-usdc Paymnet Gateway with instant payouts to your walllet without KYC
features: Accept USD Coin erc20 directly on your website
Unique erc20/usdc receiving address for every order
Instant payouts settlement to your erc20/usdc wallet
ZERO KYC for both the merchant and the customer.
